It can be considered a version of five - a - side football . Futsal is played between two teams of five players each , one of whom is the goalkeeper . Unlimited substitutions are permitted . The surface , ball , and rules create an emphasis on improvisation , creativity , and technique as well as ball control and passing in small spaces . Since then , all other names (Patient) have been officially and internationally changed (Verb) to " futsal " . The naming was due to a dispute between FIFUSA (s13 the predecessor to the AMF ) and FIFA over the name of " fútbol " , FIFUSA has registered the word " fut - sal " in 1985 (s13 Madrid , Spain ) . The term genome can be applied specifically to mean what is stored on a complete set of nuclear DNA (s13 i.e. , the " nuclear genome " ) but can also be applied to what is stored within organelles that contain their own DNA , as with the " mitochondrial genome " or the " chloroplast genome " .
